I the undersigned hereby pledge to:
	•
Inform the HR department immediately of any 
changeﺃinﺃmyﺃsocialﺃstatus,ﺃorﺃtheﺃsocialﺃstatusﺃ

	• Reportﺃanyﺃotherﺃhealthﺃinsuranceﺃissuedﺃfromﺃ
anyﺃotherﺃpartyﺃinﺃtheﺃcountry.
	• Handﺃoverﺃmyﺃchildren’sﺃhealthﺃcardsﺃonceﺃtheyﺃ
reach 18 years of age or in case of death.
	• Handﺃoverﺃallﺃtheﺃhealthﺃcardsﺃissuedﺃtoﺃmeﺃandﺃ
myﺃfamilyﺃatﺃtheﺃendﺃofﺃservice.
